resources.string: No data generated in this app is stored online and no personal information is gathered. This app uses Google analytics, Firebase Crashlytics and Firebase Performance to track user engagement and identify issues with the app so that we can improve the app in the future.

D&D 5e Dungeon Generator was created to showcase an algorithm I wrote for a University final year project for the degree of Computer Science. The title of the project was “Generating Dungeons & Dragons dungeons that make visible sense in the context of a narrative”. Due to the limited time to write this algorithm and implement it/the app, there are some limitations to the dungeons. Whilst some limitations may be implemented in the future, I cannot guarantee that as all work is done in my spare time.\n\nIf you would like to read the paper I wrote, see it below.

The app is open source!\nThis means a few things, If you would simply like to keep up to date on what changes are coming soon you can see these in the main page.\nYou can also create an issue to request some changes/additions, and you can make changes yourself! It also means you can just read the source code to see how the algorithm works!
Dungeons and Dragons System Reference Document
